name: Card Explorer
description:
Card Explorer is a card based puzzle game where in each level you must combine your cards to complete the given task. Have fun.

I may or may not update this project in the future.
Also yes, I do know that most level icons are 'glitched', I might fix them if I ever update the game, but I don't really care as they are just a little visual problems and making this game has really burned me out.

How To Play

Use your mouse to grab, move and drop the cards. Drop the cards on eachother to combine them. Not all cards combine.
